title: Stationery, "Babas", 1980s
creditline: Gift of Tibor Kalman/ M & co.
description:
1993-151-345 - 1 - letterhead: In the upper right corner, the logo, Babas, is imprinted in bold serif-style capitals. In the lower right corner, the address and telephone number are imprinted on five lines in miniscule sans serif type.
1993-151-345 - 2 - envelope: In the upper left corner, the logo, Babas, is imprinted in bold serif-style capitals. In the lower left corner, the return address is imprinted in miniscule sans serif type.
1993-151-345 - 3 - business card: From the left to right edge, occupying almost the entire upper half, the logo, Baas, is imprinted in bold serif-style capitals. Centered in the lower half, the name and address are imprinted on four lines in miniscule sans serif type.

tombstone.epitaph:
Stationery, "Babas", 1980s.
1980s. Offset lithography. Gift of Tibor Kalman/ M & co.. 1993-151-345-1/3.
